text: I'd like to thank the folks at blue

the fact that Ellen DeGeneres is on

introduce yourself okay hello I'm Joseph

never back
from up to sixth grade I had no friends
no close friends at all like period
none once a week they call me and Joseph

because he just couldn't function
anymore we felt that the emotional

Joe a lot of problems and we felt that
whatever other issues he was dealing
with were tied up in that
we do that coming out was going to be a
very tricky thing for him and the odds
that it would go well we're not good
and he had this day when he just blew up
at these other boys and he came home and
he went into the bathroom and gathered
up all the benadryl in the house and
started taking it and he had looked at
the warning that said do not take more
than 12 pills in any 24-hour period so
he made sure to take more than twice as
many as that he was deadly serious and
but the lucky thing is that it's really
hard to overdose on benadryl I go to the
center every Saturday it's a place where
you can go and basically just talk with
awesome gay people that's where he found
out he wasn't alone and he found out
that other kids have worse stories he
came home one day and he said you know
I'm really boring you know compared to
these other kids the things that they've
been through and I'm just you know my
story isn't even all that interesting if
there's anything I want to get across
about this book is that it's not the
simple story it's not the teen
homosexual teen bullied suicide attempt
because there's so much more going on
there's the attempt over 10 or 12 years
to apply a diagnosis to Joe's behavior
because he was so troubled in school and
when a teacher would push him he would
push back and they and teacher said oh
this is oppositional defiant disorder I
think he's got ADHD this seems to be an
autism spectrum problem it could be
Asperger's and over and over we heard
these diagnoses in a huge in really
profound way when he was out and passed
the sort of emotional explosion of
coming out he was himself
in the pressure law and he just over the
next year and a half two years started
